title: Olly Smith Event for The Mail on Sunday
text: If you're searching for good-value party fizz to light up your Halloween, pop to Aldi and pick up its Exquisite Collection Prosecco Superiore DOCG (11%) for £7.99. For the price, it's unbeatable. But while Prosecco may still be a crowd-pleaser I've found even more beautiful bargains from Spain. Cava is the future - and if I'm slapping down the cash for party bubbles, that's what I'm buying. My wine of the week from Morrisons is ace for £7.50, otherwise grab Tesco Finest 2016 (12%) for £9, or Aldi's Exquisite Collection 2016 (11.5%) at £6.49 ...read
description: Olly Smith Event for The Mail on Sunday Columnist Archive for MailOnline
